languages.text: "Ты прикидываешься верным и набожным слугой Императора, но не демонстрируешь истинного рвения и пыла веры. На корабле твоем не гремят гимны и хоралы в его честь, столица твоя не приведена в богобоязненный трепет. В столь темный час тебе дарована честь быть светочем праведности в глазах Простора, а ты... ты предательски тускл{mf||а}".

"You pretend to be a faithful and devout servant of the Emperor, but you show no true zeal or fervour in faith. Your ship does not shake with hymns and chants to glorify His name, and your capital has not been led into pious trepidation. In so dark an hour, you have been granted the honour of being a light of righteousness in the eyes of the Expanse, but your light... is traitorously dim."
languages.original_text: "Ты прикидываешься верным и набожным слугой Императора, но не демонстрируешь истинного рвения и пыла веры. На корабле твоем не гремят гимны и хоралы в его честь, столица твоя не приведена в богобоязненный трепет. В столь темный час тебе дарована честь быть светочем праведности в глазах Простора, а ты... ты предательски тускл{mf||а}".

In so dark an hour, you have been granted the honour of being a light of righteousness in the eyes of the Expanse, but your light... is traitorously dim."

languages.text: “你假装自己是帝皇忠实、虔诚的仆人，但你对信仰完全没有真正的热情。你的舰船从来没有因为赞颂祂的圣名而搏动，你的首都也从来没有出于虔诚的恐惧而震颤。在这黑暗的时刻，你甚至得到了如此荣耀，成为了科罗努斯扩区的正义之光，但你的光明……不过是充满背叛的缥缈罢了。”
languages.original_text: "You pretend to be a faithful and devout servant of the Emperor, but you show no true zeal or fervour in faith. Your ship does not shake with hymns and chants to glorify His name, and your capital has not been led into pious trepidation. In so dark an hour, you have been granted the honour of being a light of righteousness in the eyes of the Expanse, but your light... is traitorously dim."

traits.locale_text: “你假装自己是帝皇忠实、虔诚的仆人，但你对信仰完全没有真正的热情。你的舰船从来没有因为赞颂祂的圣名而搏动，你的首都也从来没有出于虔诚的恐惧而震颤。在这黑暗的时刻，你甚至得到了如此荣耀，成为了科罗努斯扩区的正义之光，但你的光明……不过是充满背叛的缥缈罢了。”

languages.text: «Finge servir al Emperador con fe y devoción, pero no muestra fervor alguno en sus creencias. Su nave no resuena con himnos y cánticos de alabanza ni su capital se estremece de piedad. En este momento tan oscuro, se le ha concedido el honor de ser una luz de la justicia ante la Extensión. Pero su luz... es traicioneramente tenue».
languages.original_text: "You pretend to be a faithful and devout servant of the Emperor, but you show no true zeal or fervour in faith. Your ship does not shake with hymns and chants to glorify His name, and your capital has not been led into pious trepidation. In so dark an hour, you have been granted the honour of being a light of righteousness in the eyes of the Expanse, but your light... is traitorously dim."

traits.locale_text: «Finge servir al Emperador con fe y devoción, pero no muestra fervor alguno en sus creencias. Su nave no resuena con himnos y cánticos de alabanza ni su capital se estremece de piedad. En este momento tan oscuro, se le ha concedido el honor de ser una luz de la justicia ante la Extensión. Pero su luz... es traicioneramente tenue».

languages.text: 「皇帝に忠実かつ敬虔な下僕であるかのように装っているが、真の熱意も信仰への狂熱も示していない。お前の船は唱歌や聖歌で揺れ動くこともなく、主の御名を讃えることもない。そして、その都は敬虔な畏れに導かれることもない。このような暗黒の時代にあって、お前はエクスパンスの目にが正義の光として映る名誉を与えられた。だが、その光は…裏切り者のように幽きものだ」
languages.original_text: "You pretend to be a faithful and devout servant of the Emperor, but you show no true zeal or fervour in faith. Your ship does not shake with hymns and chants to glorify His name, and your capital has not been led into pious trepidation. In so dark an hour, you have been granted the honour of being a light of righteousness in the eyes of the Expanse, but your light... is traitorously dim."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝に忠実かつ敬虔な下僕であるかのように装っているが、真の熱意も信仰への狂熱も示していない。お前の船は唱歌や聖歌で揺れ動くこともなく、主の御名を讃えることもない。そして、その都は敬虔な畏れに導かれることもない。このような暗黒の時代にあって、お前はエクスパンスの目にが正義の光として映る名誉を与えられた。だが、その光は…裏切り者のように幽きものだ」

languages.text: « Vous prétendez être {mf|un|une} fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante} de l'Empereur, mais ne faites preuve d'aucun zèle ni d'aucune ferveur dans votre foi. Votre vaisseau ne résonne pas des hymnes et des chants qui honorent Son nom, et vous n'avez pas soumis votre capitale à une pieuse trépidation. En ces heures sombres, vous avez reçu l'insigne honneur d'incarner la lumière de la vertu aux yeux des Étendues, mais cette lumière que vous diffusez... est faible et trompeuse. »
languages.original_text: "You pretend to be a faithful and devout servant of the Emperor, but you show no true zeal or fervour in faith. Your ship does not shake with hymns and chants to glorify His name, and your capital has not been led into pious trepidation. In so dark an hour, you have been granted the honour of being a light of righteousness in the eyes of the Expanse, but your light... is traitorously dim."

traits.locale_text: « Vous prétendez être {mf|un|une} fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante} de l'Empereur, mais ne faites preuve d'aucun zèle ni d'aucune ferveur dans votre foi. Votre vaisseau ne résonne pas des hymnes et des chants qui honorent Son nom, et vous n'avez pas soumis votre capitale à une pieuse trépidation. En ces heures sombres, vous avez reçu l'insigne honneur d'incarner la lumière de la vertu aux yeux des Étendues, mais cette lumière que vous diffusez... est faible et trompeuse. »

languages.text: "Ihr gebt vor, {mf|ein treuer und frommer Diener|eine treue und fromme Dienerin} des Imperators zu sein, doch Ihr zeigt keinerlei wahren Eifer oder wahre Inbrunst in Eurem Glauben. Euer Schiff erbebt nicht vor Hymnen und Gesängen zu seinen Ehren, und Eure Hauptstadt wurde nicht in fromme Furcht geführt. In einer so dunklen Stunde, wurde Euch die Ehre gewährt, ein Licht der Rechtschaffenheit in den Augen der Ausdehnung zu sein, doch Euer Licht ... ist trübe wie das eines Verräters."
languages.original_text: "You pretend to be a faithful and devout servant of the Emperor, but you show no true zeal or fervour in faith. Your ship does not shake with hymns and chants to glorify His name, and your capital has not been led into pious trepidation. In so dark an hour, you have been granted the honour of being a light of righteousness in the eyes of the Expanse, but your light... is traitorously dim."

In einer so dunklen Stunde, wurde Euch die Ehre gewährt, ein Licht der Rechtschaffenheit in den Augen der Ausdehnung zu sein, doch Euer Licht ... ist trübe wie das eines Verräters."

languages.text: "İmparator'un adanmış ve inançlı bir hizmetkârı gibi davranıyorsun ama imanında ne coşku ne de şevk görebiliyorum. Geminde O'nu yücelten ilahilerden ve şarkılardan eser yok. Başkentine günah korkusunu aşılayamamışsın. Şu kara günde Enginlik'in gözlerinde doğru yolu gösteren ışık olma vazifesiyle şereflendirilmişken hiç parlamıyorsun bile... Bu da hıyanete işaret eder."
languages.original_text: "You pretend to be a faithful and devout servant of the Emperor, but you show no true zeal or fervour in faith. Your ship does not shake with hymns and chants to glorify His name, and your capital has not been led into pious trepidation. In so dark an hour, you have been granted the honour of being a light of righteousness in the eyes of the Expanse, but your light... is traitorously dim."
